entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
